time. The current version of this OS has drawn criticism for its lack of multitasking. Joe Fiore, the head of the Windows Phone 7 team, joined Steve Ballmer on stage at the MWC and said, When apps run in the background, you risk draining your battery. Our implementation provides a battery-safe solution for third-party multitasking.
